name: Tuolon Tales
description:
NOTE: I'm not sure whether or not I'll continue this game's development until release. I'm  just trying to get back into the swing of making things on RPG Maker so I thought I'd make a little experimental project.

Let me know what you guys think!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A brave hero is called out for by a mysterious voice, the call is intercepted leaving the hero with severe memory loss and no information on the call for assistance.

Along the story you'll make new friends, find out about your past, solve the mysteries and save the land of Tuolon!
